response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and relevance to you, worth $1,200,000 to you personally. I am extending this unique chance to purchase it directly from us at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you secure a remarkable asset at a favorable rate.

Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this exceptional deal. I am here to answer any questions you might have and guide you through the process.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
